text:
Matlab pehli ladki jiske saath comfortable, bina sharmaye, walk karte karte baat kar saku. Abhi bhi yaad hai woh techkriti ke food fest wali walk. Ladkiyo mai role model ho tum matlab. Situation ke hisab se mature n fun (EDM wala dance ğŸ˜). Tumne wo mera coffee wala cup leke, khud jo dustbin mai dala, I was like-ye bandi jyada hi sahi hai! Wo glowing band abhi bhi h mere paas tumhara diya hua. Ek baar eye ke corner se dekha ki tum muzhe bula rahi thi (dekha nahi kyuki koi aur laga). But mood ke dekha to tum smile kar rahi thi, even though maine galti se ignore kiya tha. Mannn, tu sahi mai alag hai (tum se tu pe aagaya na mai ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚). Tumhare family ke saath status dekh ke khushi milti hai sach mai. Aise hi haste raho please (atleast tumhe dekhe kabhi depression nahi ayega muzhe ğŸ˜¶). Milna hai tumse phir kabhi ek baar toh. Tumhare aage ke har status pe meri love reacts gurantteed hai aisa samjo ab. Saath to itna time nahi spend kiya, but dekh rahe ho na...ye memoir bhar gaya ussi se. Itna kahunga ki bas modo pe yaad karlena kabhi life ke, kabhi hum bhi hasane ki koshish karnege tumhe - agar kabhi udas ho to.  
With Love â¤ - Rohit
author: Rohit Baliram Landge

text: Kya hi bolu is adbhut, adakari, ujjwal aur yuva sajjan ke bare mai. Teri ada toh katil hai hi, teri baate bhi. Tuzse aur milna kyu nahi hua, ek badi regret hai ye meri clg ki. Par samaj lo ab feelings. Tuzhe dekha tha maine last yearites ke dance fest mai nachte. Katil moves hai re teri nana, acting toh chappar faad matlab. Sabhi tantotant thi apki involvements. kisi mai kuch kami nahi. tere ko yaad karke mai toh smile karta hu abhi bhi. Sad to hota hi nahi tu shayad kabhi. Mil lena bro abhi bhi hum ji rahe. Missing you brother (kaku la zaadu dyayla yenar mi tuzya ghari lavkarch ğŸ˜‰ğŸ¤£)!
author: Rohit Baliram Landge

text: Rochak baba, sala apni branch same chahiye thi, maza aata. Waise bhi tu COOL toh lagda hi hai, par ekaad dusri cool addition sahi hoti hai ğŸ˜‰. Nana aur tere saath bhai aisa hua hi nahi kabhi ki maza nahi aaya. Sutta kabhi tere hath se liya toh nahi, par samaj le saath hi mai maze kar raha tha mai bhi. Movie ko sath mai nahi gaye kabhi, filmy to tu hai hi par. Teri smile dardnivarak hai, teri shayari moh le jati hai, to kabhi patani hai to ye dono ka istimal karke advantage le lena. Aur chai peyenge, raat mai bina raatte ke bas mazhe marenge, milna bas bhai mere â¤
author: Rohit Baliram Landge

text: Kaise haal ex roomie, ab age future mai itni darwani entry nahi hogi kabhi, wo toh ek hi baar hoti hai na. Ghabrana nahi, saath mai tumhare, aawaj acchi hai ruju boli thi teri, sach mai sala. Baaki bakchodi to tum karte hi ho, thoda himachal aur goa bhi ghumawawo kabhi.
author: Rohit Baliram Landge
